Lack enough support: The claim lacks evidence or proof that CNN lightened the photo of the man who drove into the protester in Seattle.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no evidence that CNN ran an altered image of the man in its coverage of the Seattle shooting.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that CNN manipulated its coverage of the Seattle shooting without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the photo of the man may have been doctored by someone else and falsely attributed to CNN.
